name: Woocommerce-sort-variations-admin
tagline: Sorts WooCommerce variations by ID in admin.
body:
# WooCommerce Variation Sorting in Admin

WordPress/WooCommerce plugin to sort WooCommerce products variations in admin by variation ID.

## Installation

1. Upload the folder to the `/wp-content/plugins/` directory
2. Activate the plugin through the 'Plugins' menu in WordPress

## Frequently Asked Questions

### Does it have a paid version?

No, not yet. Plugin is free and support is also free at the moment. Donations are appreciated though.

## Changelog

* 0.1 - First version release.
